name: com.tivadar.best.serversentevents
description: The EventSource class provides an implementation of the Server-Sent Events (SSE) standard. SSE is a simple and efficient protocol to receive real-time updates over HTTP. Instead of continually polling the server for changes, clients can open a single connection and receive updates as they happen, making it a powerful tool for building real-time applications.

samples.description: Contains sample codes for various SSE related scenarios.
